This workspace contains a Django project. When generating code, prefer to use Django best practices, class-based views where appropriate, and keep settings configurable via environment variables for sensitive data.

- Use Python 3.8+ compatibility.
- Follow PEP8 formatting.
- Prefer using virtual environments created with `python -m venv .venv`.
- Include migrations in the repository.
